title: Day 5: Ping still 100-150.
body:
My ping was 50 just fine. I play at work. In a building on the SAME BLOCK but it has Time Warner instead of Verizon. They are literally less then 500 feet apart and I get 50ms there consistently. 100+ with Verizon. But 37ms ping to google on Verizon.

Whats going on?

replies.body: Hey there! I can try and help you out :/ Sounds like you might be having connnection issues, why not troubleshoot the problem and go from there? I'll be on for awhile so I can help you figure this out!!! https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664

Hello friend. Please refer to my prior thread

boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/svTGF7Vy-na-showing-servers-as-west-coast-150-ping

When I actually went through the trouble of trace routing my network traffic. While the traffic no longer is being routed through that node, my ping to League and ONLY league is 100-150ms consistently in game.

Pings to google.com are 37ms consistently. Even while playing league. Also this problem has been widespread among only Verizon users in the upper east coast for over a week now. No response from Riot. If you would like my logs I will gladly post them for you to have fun with, but I assure you; the problem is NOT on my end.
I guess if no ones talking about it on Reddit Riot doesn't care!
God don't tell me the problem is still there? I guess ill back next week instead of playing a game of Russian roulette with my team.
